hero.title: Design AI Reliable Engagement
hero.subtitle: A framework for responsible AI integration in design processes
hero.description: The DARE Framework offers a structured approach to adopting artificial intelligence in design, preserving human autonomy and promoting reliable outcomes.

about.title: About DARE
about.subtitle: A structured approach
about.description: The DARE Framework establishes progressive levels of AI engagement in design processes, from fully manual approaches to advanced automation integration.

community.title: Community-Driven
community.description: Inspired by models like Creative Commons, the DARE Framework is open for public contribution and adaptation, creating a living system that evolves with AI technology.

human.title: Human-Centered
human.description: DARE emphasizes that AI should enhance—not replace—human creativity, establishing guidelines that preserve the integrity of design work while leveraging the advantages of AI.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: The framework provides clear guidelines on disclosing AI use in design work, helping to establish ethical standards and build trust with clients and users.

practical.title: Practical
practical.description: Each framework level includes specific tools, processes, and considerations, making it immediately applicable to real-world design challenges.

footer.badge: A framework for all adoption levels
footer.title: From Fully Manual to AI-Guided Automation
footer.description: The DARE Framework organizes AI adoption into a spectrum of six distinct levels, helping design teams navigate artificial intelligence integration in a controlled and ethical manner.

framework.title: The Framework
framework.subtitle: Six progressive levels
framework.description: Six progressive levels of AI integration in design, from fully manual approaches to advanced automation — each with its appropriate use cases.
framework.error: An error occurred while loading the framework levels. Please try again later.

metrics.title: Evolutionary metrics
metrics.subtitle: Framework Evolution
metrics.description: The progressive integration of AI in design processes and its impacts on key metrics

principles.title: Core principles
list: AI should augment, not replace human creativity
Transparency about AI use is essential
Designers must maintain control over critical decisions
Tools should enhance skills, not create dependency

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.subtitle: Collaborate with DARE
contribute.description: The DARE Framework is a community-driven, open project. There are several ways to contribute to its ongoing development.

suggest.title: Suggest Changes
suggest.description: Propose modifications to existing framework levels, descriptions, or examples through GitHub issues or pull requests.

creator.title: About the Creator
creator.description: Gui Gonzalez is a designer passionate about processes, who seeks to incorporate AI in a healthy way in the Design market, so that a new design emerges along with paradigm shifts.

translate.title: Translate
translate.description: Help make DARE accessible to designers worldwide by contributing translations of the framework into different languages.

guidelines.title: Contribution Guidelines
guidelines.license: The DARE Framework is made available under the {{licenseLink}}.
steps: Create a branch for your contribution
Make your changes following our code and documentation standards
Submit a pull request with a clear description of the changes
guidelines.conduct: All contributors must follow our {{codeOfConductLink}}, which promotes an inclusive and welcoming environment.

footer.description: A collaborative framework for responsible and effective AI integration in design processes.
